sk1.name: Penitence
sk1.desc: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.

sk2.name: Test of Faith
sk2.desc: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.

sk3.name: Holy Persuasion
sk3.desc: Gives control of an enemy or neutral creep, and gives it bonus hit points.

sk4.name: Hand of God
sk4.desc: Fully regenerates any creeps under Chen's control and heals all allied heroes on the map.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
